answers.answer: only if you are overweight, like me, was a good thing that i was loosing weight, my baby still growing so all good
I'm 34weeks +5days, and I've lost 13pounds since being pregnant. Speak with your doctor as long as bubs is still and healthy they may not be to worried

36 weeks and only gained 5 pounds... Haven't gained any since last month, but baby is growing perfect so I guess I kinda have lost some weight, my doctor congratulated me because he said I was on the risk of getting gestational diabetes since I was a little on the overweight side, but that thankfully didn't happen, so don't worry, if the doctor doesn't say it's bad then be happy you don't have to work as hard to get back in shape!

question: I am 26 week pregnant and loosing weight is it normal?
title: loosing weight
